SCP 0.2.4

Cell classification

Source: R/SCP-analysis.R
CellScoring.Rd

Cell classification

Usage

CellScoring(
  srt,
  features = NULL,
  slot = "data",
  assay = "RNA",
  split.by = NULL,
  IDtype = "symbol",
  species = "Homo_sapiens",
  db = "GO_BP",
  termnames = NULL,
  db_update = FALSE,
  db_version = "latest",
  convert_species = FALSE,
  Ensembl_version = 103,
  mirror = NULL,
  minGSSize = 10,
  maxGSSize = 500,
  method = "Seurat",
  classification = TRUE,
  name = "",
  new_assay = FALSE,
  BPPARAM = BiocParallel::bpparam(),
  progressbar = TRUE,
  force = FALSE,
  seed = 11,
  ...
)

Arguments

...

Examples

data("pancreas_sub")
ccgenes <- CC_GenePrefetch("Mus_musculus")
#> Using cached conversion results for Mus_musculus
pancreas_sub <- Standard_SCP(pancreas_sub)
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:12] Start Standard_SCP
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:12] Checking srtList... ...
#> Data 1/1 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 1/1 of the srtList...
#> Use the separate HVF from the existed HVF in srtList...
#> Number of available HVF: 2000
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:14] Finished checking.
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:14] Perform ScaleData on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:14] Perform linear dimension reduction (pca) on the data...
#> dims_estimate is 1:18 for 'pca'
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:15] Perform FindClusters (louvain) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:16] Reorder clusters...
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:16] Perform nonlinear dimension reduction (umap) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:25] Standard_SCP done
#> Elapsed time: 12.76 secs 
pancreas_sub <- CellScoring(
  srt = pancreas_sub,
  features = list(S = ccgenes$cc_S_genes, G2M = ccgenes$cc_G2M_genes),
  method = "Seurat", name = "CC"
)
#> Number of feature lists to be scored: 2
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:25] Start CellScoring
#> Threads used: 1
#> 
  |                                                                                                                    
  |                                                                                                              |   0%
  |                                                                                                                    
  |==============================================================================================================| 100%
#> 
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:25] CellScoring done
#> Elapsed time: 0.52 secs 
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, "CC_classification")

ExpDimPlot(pancreas_sub, "CC_G2M")


data("panc8_sub")
panc8_sub <- Integration_SCP(panc8_sub,
  batch = "tech", integration_method = "Seurat"
)
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:28] Start Seurat_integrate
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:29] Checking srtList... ...
#> Data 1/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 1/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 2/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 2/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 3/5 of the srtList is normalized without log transformation. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 3/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 4/5 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 4/5 of the srtList...
#> Data 5/5 of the srtList is raw counts. Perform NormalizeData(logCPM) on the data ...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 5/5 of the srtList...
#> Use the separate HVF from the existed HVF in srtList...
#> Number of available HVF: 2000
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:34] Finished checking.
#> [2022-12-08 10:35:34] Perform FindIntegrationAnchors on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:06] Perform integration(Seurat) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:20] Perform ScaleData on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:21] Perform linear dimension reduction (pca) on the data...
#> dims_estimate is 1:16 for 'pca'
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:23] Perform FindClusters (louvain) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:23] Reorder clusters...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:23] Perform nonlinear dimension reduction (umap) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 10:36:33] Seurat_integrate done
#> Elapsed time: 1.09 mins 
ClassDimPlot(panc8_sub, group.by = c("tech", "celltype"))


panc8_sub <- CellScoring(
  srt = panc8_sub, slot = "data", assay = "RNA",
  db = "GO_BP", species = "Homo_sapiens",
  minGSSize = 10, maxGSSize = 100,
  method = "Seurat", name = "GO", new_assay = TRUE
)
#> Species: Homo_sapiens
#> Preparing database: GO_BP
#> Convert ID types for the database: GO_BP
#> Connect to the Ensembl archives...
#> Using the 103 version of biomart...
#> Connect to the biomart...
#> Connect to the dataset hsapiens_gene_ensembl ...
#> Match and convert the geneID...
#> 18145 genes mapped with entrez_id
#> ==============================
#> 18145 genes mapped
#> 655 genes unmapped
#> ==============================
#> Warning: The following list of features were filtered because none of features were found in the srt assay:
#> negative regulation of vascular endothelial growth factor production, xenobiotic glucuronidation
#> Number of feature lists to be scored: 5066
#> [2022-12-08 10:38:45] Start CellScoring
#> Threads used: 1
#> 
  |                                                                                                                    
  |                                                                                                              |   0%
  |                                                                                                                    
  |==============================================================================================================| 100%
#> 
#> Warning: Feature names cannot have underscores ('_'), replacing with dashes ('-')
#> [2022-12-08 10:53:29] CellScoring done
#> Elapsed time: 14.74 mins 
panc8_sub <- Integration_SCP(panc8_sub,
  assay = "GO",
  batch = "tech", integration_method = "Seurat"
)
#> [2022-12-08 10:53:29] Start Seurat_integrate
#> [2022-12-08 10:53:30] Checking srtList... ...
#> Error: 'GO' is not an assay
ClassDimPlot(panc8_sub, group.by = c("tech", "celltype"))


pancreas_sub <- CellScoring(
  srt = pancreas_sub, slot = "data", assay = "RNA",
  db = "GO_BP", species = "Mus_musculus",
  termnames = panc8_sub[["GO"]]@meta.features[, "termnames"],
  method = "Seurat", name = "GO", new_assay = TRUE
)
#> Species: Mus_musculus
#> Preparing database: GO_BP
#> Convert ID types for the database: GO_BP
#> Connect to the Ensembl archives...
#> Using the 103 version of biomart...
#> Connect to the biomart...
#> Connect to the dataset mmusculus_gene_ensembl ...
#> Match and convert the geneID...
#> 22313 genes mapped with entrez_id
#> ==============================
#> 22313 genes mapped
#> 6501 genes unmapped
#> ==============================
#> Warning: The following list of features were filtered because none of features were found in the srt assay:
#> response to corticosterone
#> Number of feature lists to be scored: 5063
#> [2022-12-08 10:56:05] Start CellScoring
#> Threads used: 1
#> 
  |                                                                                                                    
  |                                                                                                              |   0%
  |                                                                                                                    
  |==============================================================================================================| 100%
#> 
#> Warning: Feature names cannot have underscores ('_'), replacing with dashes ('-')
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:25] CellScoring done
#> Elapsed time: 7.34 mins 
pancreas_sub <- Standard_SCP(pancreas_sub, assay = "GO")
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:25] Start Standard_SCP
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:25] Checking srtList... ...
#> Warning: Negative values detected!
#> Warning: Can not determine whether data 1 is log-normalized...
#> Perform FindVariableFeatures on the data 1/1 of the srtList...
#> Warning: NaNs produced
#> Warning: number of items to replace is not a multiple of replacement length
#> Use the separate HVF from the existed HVF in srtList...
#> Number of available HVF: 2000
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:28] Finished checking.
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:28] Perform ScaleData on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:28] Perform linear dimension reduction (pca) on the data...
#> dims_estimate is 1:25 for 'pca'
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:30] Perform FindClusters (louvain) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:30] Reorder clusters...
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:31] Perform nonlinear dimension reduction (umap) on the data...
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:40] Standard_SCP done
#> Elapsed time: 14.3 secs 
ClassDimPlot(pancreas_sub, "SubCellType")


pancreas_sub[["tech"]] <- "Mouse"
panc_merge <- Integration_SCP(
  srtList = list(panc8_sub, pancreas_sub),
  assay = "GO",
  batch = "tech", integration_method = "Seurat"
)
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:40] Start Seurat_integrate
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:40] Checking srtList... ...
#> Error: 'GO' is not an assay
ClassDimPlot(panc_merge, group.by = c("tech", "celltype", "SubCellType", "Phase"))
#> Error in ClassDimPlot(panc_merge, group.by = c("tech", "celltype", "SubCellType",     "Phase")): object 'panc_merge' not found

genenames <- make.unique(stringr::str_to_title(rownames(panc8_sub[["RNA"]])))
panc8_sub <- RenameFeatures(panc8_sub, newnames = genenames, assay = "RNA")
#> Rename features for the assay: RNA
head(rownames(panc8_sub))
#> [1] "A1bg"   "A1cf"   "A2m"    "A4galt" "Aaas"   "Aacs"  
panc_merge <- Integration_SCP(
  srtList = list(panc8_sub, pancreas_sub),
  assay = "RNA",
  batch = "tech", integration_method = "Seurat"
)
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:40] Start Seurat_integrate
#> [2022-12-08 11:03:40] Checking srtList... ...
#> Warning: 'srtList' have different feature names! Will subset the common features for downstream analysis!
#> Error in check_srtList(srtList = srtList, batch = batch, assay = assay,     do_normalization = do_normalization, do_HVF_finding = do_HVF_finding,     normalization_method = normalization_method, HVF_source = HVF_source,     HVF_method = HVF_method, nHVF = nHVF, HVF_intersect = HVF_intersect,     HVF_min_intersection = HVF_min_intersection, HVF = HVF, vars_to_regress = vars_to_regress,     seed = seed): batch column('tech') was not found in one or more object of the srtList!
ClassDimPlot(panc_merge, group.by = c("tech", "celltype", "SubCellType", "Phase"))
#> Error in ClassDimPlot(panc_merge, group.by = c("tech", "celltype", "SubCellType",     "Phase")): object 'panc_merge' not found
